original_title: 42 including pickpockets and ‘perverts’ nabbed in operation to curb public transport harassment
original_body_lines: A total of 42 suspects have been arrested in a special island-wide operation to curb harassment on public transport on Wednesday (Feb.07).
Among the arrestees are 18 suspects accused of sexual harassment and 5 pickpockets.
The special operation was mounted by policemen in civvies on public transport services, according to Acting IGP Deshabandu Tennakoon.
